Caption: Prof. D. Venkateswarlu, Head of Department, Chemical Engineering, reads out the names of graduands of the Department of Chemical Engineering. Prof. B. Sengupto, Director, gives away the degrees.
Description: On the dais, behind the table is chief guest Mr. M. C. Chagla. To his left: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors), Dr. Rajah Sir Muthiah Chettiar (member, Board of Governors), Mr. Akbar Alikhan (member, Board of Governors), Dr. Y. Nayudamma, Mr. A. A. Rahim (member, Board of Governors), Prof. E. G. Ramachandran, Prof. R. G. Narayanamurthi, Prof. Klein, Prof. P. C. Varghese and Prof. Lutz. A total of 18 students graduated with a degree in Chemical Engineering in 1965.
